<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Control </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the effective commander of the vehicle. Effective commander is the player whom driver AI will listen to. So if in a tank there is a gunner and a commander and AI driver, if the [[effectiveCommander]] is gunner, then gunner pressing WASD will give AI orders to move. If gunner jumps out and then enters tank again, the [[effectiveCommander]] role most likely has changed to commander that remained in tank. Also the assignment seems to work on first come first served basis. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''effectiveCommander''' vehicle </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Object]] - commander unit </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>


</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_commander = [[effectiveCommander]] tank;
</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value> 
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[setEffectiveCommander]], [[commander]], [[driver]], [[gunner]], [[currentPilot]], [[vehicleMoveInfo]]  </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
